Game.Name: Sky Destroyer (Japan)
Game.plot: Sky Destroyer is a Shoot-'Em-Up game, developed and published by Taito Corporation, which was released in Japan in 1985.http://www.gamefaqs.com/console/nes/home/578252.htmlCheat: InvincibilityPress and hold Select & Start and press Reset. If done right, you will be invincible.Cheat: Secret MessageDuring gameplay, take damage to both left and right wings. Do this three times and you should see a secret message on the game over screen.Cheat: Bonus DirigibleDestroy a floating battleship just before it disappears in the horizon and you will see flying dirigible. Shoot it for a reward.
Game.Notes: Sky Destroyer (スカイデストロイヤー Sukai Desutoroiyā?) is a rail shooter video game in which the player controls a WWII Japanese monoplane. The pilot is required to destroy enemies to clear stages. It was released by Taito Corporation in 1985 for video arcades as well as for the Family Computer.
